Our other requirements for the video would be to overlay our logo in the corner of the screen. Videos would range from 2 minutes to probably around 4/5 minutes max. We would like to do all of the videos with one individual, and we're contacting the best producers on freelancer, fiverr and a few other sites. We wanted to know what the cost of this would be and how fast you can turn around the project. desc: Plan Tea BAG:Episode:1-121:  3d Tea Bag appears on the screen near our branded box. Then the camera changes the angle and a viewer can see only the tea bag.2 Different herbs start to fly out of the tea bag, and they form a circle around the tea bag, at this moment the tea bag becomes smaller and moves deeper inside the screen. Now the main focus will be on herbs3 A viewer sees 10 different herbs as they rotate slowly around the center, the center is a tea bag. Herbs should be in 3D as well and as close to real image as possible4  A viewer sees how herb # 1 stops on 12 o clock mark, right above of the tea bag. We use the same effect as we used with a tea bag before, and the camera zooms in and changes an angle sand the herb now is located at the left side of the screen. On the right side of the screen we show short description and beneficial data about the herb.  We explain why each herb is so beneficial and what is the herb - detailed description, VERY IMPORTANT5 Then the camera zooms back and next herb moves t o12 o`clock position, and again the camera zooms in and changes the angle and we see just this particular herb and short description about it, when the description is over, the camera zooms back to the full view of 10 herbs. We repeat this with all herbs that compound a tea bag.6 Once we showed all the herbs, we put them back into the tea bag, next the camera changes the angle and we see how the tea bag goes into the cup of tea. Then, we show how the water inside is transformed into a Miracle Elixir - VERY Important7 Next episode shows how a regular dressed person drinks our tea8 But as soon as a person drank the tea we see how different object begin to appear on his body. We see that this person gets a shield, and a futuristic weapon / blaster, and a futuristic helmet and other futuristic guns and ammunitions. This episode shows Protective functions of herbs, and how they change you from a regular person, how you get supper strength, we show the graph, like a fuel tank from empty to Full how you are loaded with testosterone, and we see how a scale of inflammations drops from Red Zone to green Zone, as we reduce inflammations inside of your body. Different shields and weapons represent enhance immune system and each herb becomes as a different weapon and shields and helps in fight with bacteria.9 Finally we show a man dressed as a superhero and with futuristic shield and blaster in his hand shooting different bacteria10 The final epizode, the camera rotates and show the tea bag and a box of tea again and bring all the herbs back to the screen11 Return everything back to packageWe will be adding few elements at the beginning, we want to have a story-line that represents a growth from the underground, starting from just chemical elements billions of years ago and up to nowadays, to show some sort of geometrical progression, an upward movement through time and space, and to depict that nature was evolving in a much more hazardous conditions at earlier stages therefore plants have higher ability to withstand viruses and bacteria . we also want to portray that we  all,  animals and plants have the same  structure, and we often compounded  from similar elements , that  human took a lot from plants through 4.5 millions of years of evolution, Therefore , we can appeal again to plants to fight antibiotic resistant bacterias such as staphylococcus aureus and h-pylori. Please read about those bacterias as well.
title: Video animation of a Tea Bag Info graphic  - open to bidding

desc: Hello,I am Andreea and with my friend, Adina, we will open a sewing workshop. We really want a configurator for our kids tent products. We have many possible combinations of fabric colours and accesories and a configurator would be ideal.This is what we want, but for our tents: [url removed, login to view]For start, we will have 2 designs:1. tent with two sides fabric entrance2. tent with a different fabric for the upper part.1. The tent with two sides fabric entrance will have the following elements that can be personalised:- the colour of the tent- the colour of the second side of the entrance- the bias tape from the entrance- the stripe above the entrance will automatically be in the colour of the second side of the entrance, but if the customer wants, this can also be personalisedEach  tent will have the following possible additions:- "window". the window can be round or square. the window can be on the right or on the left. automatically, the "curtain" will be in the colour of the second side of the entrance.- play mat with 2 sides. each side can have different colour- pillows in different shapes: moon, star, cloud and other (about 10 different shapes). each pillow can be personalised regarding the colour- pocket- bunting flags- pompoms.2. The tent with a different fabric for the upper part.  The tent will have the following elements that can be personalised:- the colour of the lower fabric- the colour of the upper fabric- the bias tape from the entranceThis tent will have the exact the same additions like the first model.We want that each addition to increase the price with a certain amount. We want also, that each addition and each element of one ordered tent, to decrease the stocks. For example, for one playmat, the system should be able to decrease the stocks like this:- 1 m of fabric 1- 1 m of fabric 2- 0.96 cm of filling- 2.1  m of bias tapeI attached our facebook page link: [url removed, login to view]We don't have a website yet. We would prefer to be made by the person who will make the configurator for us.What price will have the configurator? And the website? What will be the estimated time for this project?We need invoice for the project and the company should be authorized for IT software production by the relevant authority in your country.Best regards,Andreea
title: 3D Configurator

This video will also include some scripted portions, and we will develop those and edit all the footage. But rather than travel to the different locations, we're looking to subcontract a video producer for each city to go to a client's office and film interviewing them with the questions we would provide. We'd anticipate the interview would take no longer than 30 minutes, planning to select a few key quotes from each client, and edit down into a 3-5 minute final video. Looking for a videographer who can help scout a good location to film when on-site, and ensure professional lighting and sound, then send raw footage for us to edit. Depending on travel time, the whole project should take no more than half a day.
title: Shoot client interview/testimonial for sales video
